testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: On the "userlogin" page, there should be a link for returning to the Front Site,
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "url" address....................................passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed And The user clicks on the Front Site link..................................passed Then The user verifies that the Front Site link redirects to the homepage...passed
